articles.author: Christy Choi
articles.title: Met Gala 2024 fashion: The best looks from the red carpet - CNN
articles.description: Celebrities descended on New York’s Metropolitan Museum of Art on Monday night for the annual Met Gala. The extravagant event raises money for the museum’s Costume Institute. Zendaya, Jennifer Lopez, Bad Bunny and Chris Hemsworth were co-chairs alongside Anna…
